# Planning

Internal project planning documentation. This content is not part of the user-facing documentation.

## Structure

- `ROADMAP.md` - High-level project direction and milestones
- `BACKLOG.md` - Feature backlog and priorities
- Issue tracking at: https://github.com/jcaldwell-labs/adventure-engine-v2/issues
